column5: I was on vacation for the last couple of weeks which I had planned on doing lots and lots of fishing! Much to my surprise, my wife had other plans for me  I manage to fish a little bit and catch a musky or two, which I have posted in previous posts. Anyway, vacations are expensive, (specially when everything around the house breaks on the first day and you have to replace stuff, like pool pump, air conditioning, anyway lots of fun). So by the end of my first week my budget was dry.. leaving credit as my only friend.. yippy! Then the phone rings, and a buddy of mine was offering me a spot on one of his Salmon charters in Lake Ontario for 2 days! AWESOME!  -sorry bud cant afford it, broke!  So sitting at home on vacation, NOT fishing..  I get the pictures from the trip... which made things worse... here are couple pictures of the fish...   WOW!      To make me extra happy about not fishing... he also includes this picture...   never say no to fishing trips! :-) specially trips on big waters!
Awesome report FIL! Some beauty fish there, nice to see Phillips hooking some quality fish!  Fish always bite when you have a change of plans
I did not catch any of these... :-(
lol vacation with wife and you expected to do lots and lots of fishing?   hahaha..   Those pics would've made me cry.

Just goes from bad to worse, eh Fil!  Don't ya just hate when a lack of money gets in the way???  Oh well, I guess you should be happy for you buddy with the charter anyway!  Wow, some beeeeeeaties!!!
I'm happy, but it's relative he always does well! So it's not a big thing for him. :-)  I have yet to get a king, I hear the peel the line out good!
Take off the "depends" and put on some pants if you're the man.
what a bunch of brutes....  you snooz you loose...  or somthing like that!
Easy for you to say.LOL  Those are some nice fish. TFS Fil.
Some awesome fish. Always happens when you're not there! Kind of like the resort owner who tells you "the guys last week did really well"

Nice Report Fil............Never EVER say No to an offer like that dude........the' Honey Do' list can wait--am sure your buddy would not charge you full charter tariff....it has not been a good weather Summer..hope i'm not making you feel bad..LOL  the darker Fish on the left looks to be about 25 pounds and a few ounces--that is 20 minutes of FUN!  Next time--just say YES--lol  Tight Lines All  ID1
